Synonyms.Synonym: Antibody to human glomerular basement membrane

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Anti-glomerular basement membrane blood test
QAPair.Answer: The glomerular basement membrane is the part of the kidney that helps filter waste and extra fluid from the blood. Anti-glomerular basement membrane antibodies are antibodies against this membrane. They can lead to kidney damage. This article describes the blood test used to detect these antibodies.
